title: FarmLink Marketing Solutions
text:
I'm currently a third year student studying Computer Science at the University of Waterloo. 
 I'm also currently in an internship at FarmLink Marketing Solutions, working as a software developer. 
 I specialize in fullstack web development. I love to learn new frameworks and languages, and I'm always looking to improve my skills. I'm also a big fan of the open-source community, and I'm always looking to learn new things. I write about my journey as a developer and many other things.
